#cloud-config
hostname: ${HOSTNAME}
swap:
  filename: /swapfile01
  size: 209715200 # 200MB
packages:
  - zsh
  - mc
  - awscli
package_update: true
package_upgrade: true
package_reboot_if_required: true
users:
  - default
  - name: smitp
    groups: [ adm, sudo ]
    sudo: [ 'ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL' ]
    shell: /bin/zsh
    ssh-authorized-keys:
    - 'ssh-rsa  smitp@debian'
write_files:
- path: /root/terraform-cloud-config.txt
  permissions: '0644'
  owner: root:root
  content: |
    Terraform cloudconfig done.
